name: subgraph-basin
description: A subgraph for indexing events emitted by Basin.

scripts.build: echo Using manifest at ./manifests/$1.yaml && yarn codegen && graph build ./manifests/$1.yaml
scripts.create-local: echo Using manifest at ./manifests/$1.yaml && graph create --node http://127.0.0.1:8020/ basin_$1
scripts.remove-local: echo Using manifest at ./manifests/$1.yaml && graph remove --node http://127.0.0.1:8020/ basin_$1
scripts.deploy-local: echo Using manifest at ./manifests/$1.yaml && yarn codegen && graph deploy --node http://127.0.0.1:8020/ --ipfs http://127.0.0.1:5001 basin_$1 ./manifests/$1.yaml
